videoSnippet.title: Fischer’s Legendary Rival || Larsen vs Kasparov || Niksic (1983)

0:00 Hello Everyone!
03:30 Game Starts!
06:20 CNG!
16:15 Pause the Video!
20:15 IWITP!
22:55 Legends of the Channel!

Bent Larsen vs Garry Kasparov
Niksic (1983), Niksic YUG, rd 7, Aug-31
Tarrasch Defense: Classical Variation (D34)

1. c4 e6 2. Nc3 d5 3. d4 c5 4. cd5 ed5 5. Nf3 Nc6 6. g3 Nf6 7. Bg2 Be7 8. O-O O-O 9. b3 Ne4 10. Bb2 Bf6 11. Na4 Re8 12. Rc1 b6 13. dc5 Bb2 14. Nb2 bc5 15. Na4 Ba6 16. Re1 c4 17. Nh4 Qa5 18. Nf5 g6 19. Nd4 Rac8 20. h4 Ne5 21. Bh3 Rc7 22. Nc2 cb3 23. ab3 Bc8 24. Bg2 Ng4 25. Rf1 Bd7 26. Ra1 Ba4 27. Ra4 Qc3 28. Be4 de4 29. e3 Qb3 30. Re4 Re4 31. Qd8 Kg7 32. Qc7 Rc4 33. Nd4 Rc7 34. Nb3 Rc2 35. Nd4 Ra2 36. e4 Rd2 37. Nc6 a6 38. e5 Re2 39. Ra1 Rf2 40. Ra6 Rc2 41. h5 Kh6 42. hg6 hg6 43. Ra4 Kg5 44. Nd4 Rc3 45. e6 Rg3 46. Kh1 f5 47. e7 Re3 48. Nc6 f4 49. Ra5 Kh4 50. Ra8 Nf6 51. Kg2 f3 52. Kf1 Kg3 53. Nd4 Ng4 54. Nf3 Rf3 55. Kg1 Nh2 56. Rf8 Rc3
